titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Hockey
Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Hockey
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:33

did.unittitle: Department of Athletics, Yale University, records documenting hockey

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of scrapbooks, correspondence, manager"s files, and publications maintained by the Yale University Department of Athletics documenting hockey at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 38-B (YRG 38-B), Records documenting specific sports at Yale.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Department of Athletics, 2005 and 2016

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Hockey (RU 938). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Hockey scrapbooks for the years 1919-1941 are available on microfilm from Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library, at cost. Order no. HM182. 1984. 1750 frames on 2 reels, 35mm.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of scrapbooks, correspondence, manager"s files, and publications maintained by the Yale University Department of Athletics documenting hockey at Yale.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

did.unittitle: Men's and women's ice hockey records
Scrapbook and photographs of Murray Murdoch

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The scrapbook contains photographs and news clippings related to the NHL career of Murray Murdoch, who played left wing for the New York Rangers in 508 games with 84 goals and 108 assists from the Rangers' first season in the 192627 NHL season until the 193637 NHL season. From 1938 to 1965, he was the sixth head coach of Yale University hockey team. In 1974, he was awarded the Lester Patrick Trophy for his contribution to hockey in the United States.

did.unittitle: Team photograph of St. John's College senior hockey team (Murdoch is top left)
Team photograph of St. John's College school rugby team (Murdoch is bottom center)
